summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1542, for the improvement of a main trunk sewer or drainage district, to be known as the "Lander Street Trunk Sewer District," by the construction within said district of a main trunk sewer along a certain described route, in accordance with certain maps, plans and specifications therefor, under Ordinance No. 16700, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
